title: Puppies
text:
Puppies
This is quarto book about puppies
Oodles are very cute.

title: my book_website sandpit
text:
This is a Quarto website. I have been asking my boyfriend Claude about how to embed a Quarto book within a website. I think I have followed his instructions, including the book in its own folder, but when I render the site the nav bar Book only links to the first page of the book and doesn’t show the rest of the book.
When I render files in the book folder separately, it works just fine.
Claude says that the repo should be structured as so…

Then the _quarto.yml for the site should look like this…

And the _quarto.yml for the book should look like this…

title: Big and small
text:
Big and small
Oodles are sometimes big

And sometimes oodles are small
